about_the_game:
CATASS is a game where you are a cat! Never let your human realize your feline plans. THROW THINGS! And many other important plans, of course. I mean... Meow.

Complete the main storyline to declare yourself a supreme cat and show your human who's in charge. CATASS is a casual game where you can demonstrate your worth as a cat through different levels and extra challenges.

An adventure filled with exciting levels, puzzles, riddles, humor, references to pop culture, and the internet.
Complete all the achievements to become the greatest cat of all time and crown yourself as the master and supreme ruler of CATASS.

CATASS is a personal project developed solo and made in my free time on weekends. And to provide a fun and exciting experience. This project is to prove myself by developing a solo game from scratch: Game design, graphics, logic, music, and animations. I've made everything except the sound effects and typography I bought in Envato Elements.

If you play the game, I beg your pardon because of all the bugs. I'm not a programmer and an absolute noob developing. Surprisingly, many great people have finished the game, streamers, VTubers, and amazing gamers around the globe. The game works. IT WORKS! I really don't know how, but it works!

Download CATASS now and experience the thrill of being a cat. You won't regret it!
detailed_description:
CATASS is a game where you are a cat! Never let your human realize your feline plans. THROW THINGS! And many other important plans, of course. I mean... Meow.

Complete the main storyline to declare yourself a supreme cat and show your human who's in charge. CATASS is a casual game where you can demonstrate your worth as a cat through different levels and extra challenges.

An adventure filled with exciting levels, puzzles, riddles, humor, references to pop culture, and the internet.
Complete all the achievements to become the greatest cat of all time and crown yourself as the master and supreme ruler of CATASS.

CATASS is a personal project developed solo and made in my free time on weekends. And to provide a fun and exciting experience. This project is to prove myself by developing a solo game from scratch: Game design, graphics, logic, music, and animations. I've made everything except the sound effects and typography I bought in Envato Elements.

If you play the game, I beg your pardon because of all the bugs. I'm not a programmer and an absolute noob developing. Surprisingly, many great people have finished the game, streamers, VTubers, and amazing gamers around the globe. The game works. IT WORKS! I really don't know how, but it works!

Download CATASS now and experience the thrill of being a cat. You won't regret it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 950 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 950 MB available space

short_description: CATASS is an indie game that is 100% free without ads. In CATASS, you'll be a cat and show your great superiority to your human through fun and short adventures, puzzles, achievements, and lots of humor. Play now!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
